summary: An Assassin follower found in \'Four shields tavern in Dragon Bridge, with Armor and weapons with custom Enchantments including a chest for the player to acquire the same equipment
descriptionHtml:
The Hassassin Acaelius is a follower found in \'Four shields tavern in Dragon Bridge, with Armor and weapons with custom Enchantments and a chest for the player to acquire the same equipment.
(Including A Powerful scimitar and several pieces of Hassassin armor.)
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/38262-1-1373664554.jpg[/img]
Neither Dawnguard, Dragonborn or Hearthfire are required for this mod.

Feel free to check out my other mod , Elite Hassassin\'s Vestments with custom Enchants - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38345//?

The word Assassin originally came from the Arabic word  ?ashsh?sh?n, an order created by Hassan-i-sabbah. The hassassins were an order of Nizari Ismailis, particularly those of Persia (and Syria) that existed from around 1092 to 1265. Posing a strong military threat to Sunni Saljuq authority within the Persian territories, the Nizari Ismailis captured and inhabited many mountain fortresses under the leadership of Hassan-i Sabbah. The word hash means cannabis, which the assassins would take before sent out to murder their target.
author: Markyboy444
